explains: adj. 海地的；海地人的；海地克里奥尔语的
n. 海地人；海地克里奥尔语

sentences.en: The U.S. Coast Guard says it rescued more than 100 Haitian refugees.
sentences.cn: 美国海岸警卫队称他们营救了一百多名海地难民。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, anger has reached the boiling point among Haitian-Americans in south Florida.
sentences.cn: 同时，南佛罗里达海地裔美国人的愤怒已经上升到了极点。

sentences.en: Haitian hunger strikers at the US naval base at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, have begun refusing all fluids and medical treatment.
sentences.cn: 古巴关塔那摩湾美国海军基地的海地绝食者开始拒绝所有流质和治疗。
